(November 2, 1927 - June 29, 2018) was a Ukrainian American comic book artist and writer.Ukrainian-American Steve Ditko is acknowledged as one of the all-time great illustrators of comic books He was best known as the artist and co- creator, with Stan Lee, of the Marvel Comics heroes Spider-Man and Doctor Strange. He was born in Johnstown, Pennsylvania. Ditko died at his New York City apartment from a heart attack on June 29, 2018 at the age of 90.Steve Ditko, Spider-Man Co-Creator and Legendary Comics Artist, Dies at 90 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American comics artists Category:American comics writers Category:Writers from Pennsylvania Category:People from Johnstown, Pennsylvania Category:Comics creators
